General.Name: Duros S.A.
General.Description: Duros S.A. designs, manufactures, and sells menswear apparel in Greece and internationally. It offers shirts, polo shirts, knitwear and cardigans, T-shirts, trousers, jackets, suits, blazers, shoes, and other accessories. The company operates 30 retail shops in Greece under the DUR label. It also sells its products online. Duros S.A. was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Patras, Greece.
